title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter n29 Ewing SGC 10 - $225 - price redux

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter n29 Ewing SGC 10 - $225 - price redux
posts.post_content:
Looking to unload this card to help pay for my recent over-budgeting of cards.  :)  The back is better than the front.  $225 dlvd.  Thanks!

Jimi
